00015 void ldmx::ParallelWorld::ConstructSD() {
00016 
00017     G4VPhysicalVolume* worldPhysical = GetWorld(); 
00018     G4LogicalVolume* worldLogical = worldPhysical->GetLogicalVolume();
00019     
00020     G4LogicalVolume* parallelWorldLogical = parser_->GetWorldVolume()->GetLogicalVolume();
00021     auxInfoReader_->readGlobalAuxInfo();
00022      
00023     for (int index = 0; index < parallelWorldLogical->GetNoDaughters(); index++) { 
00024         G4VPhysicalVolume* physicalVol = parallelWorldLogical->GetDaughter(index); 
00025         std::cout << "[ ParallelWorld ]: Adding : " 
00026                   << physicalVol->GetName() << " to parallel world." << std::endl;
00027         worldLogical->AddDaughter(physicalVol);
00028     }
00029 
00030     auxInfoReader_->assignAuxInfoToVolumes();
00031 }
